channel.title: White screen (menu, in-game)
channel.description:
Hello, I`ve happened to encounter a problem: game menu is completely blank, although it seems to work (I`m able to start or quit the game). My PC specs do match minimum system requirements, plus I`ve installed the game correctly.
Any ideas? Thanks in advance.
